name: 'Debate Camp' Online Trivia | 'West Wing' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When the President was asked to give an answer on why he chose Rooker as Attorney General, he said "bite me". In what state did Toby say "bite me" would be an acceptable answer to the question about why the President chose Rooker?
questions.explanation:
New Jersey.

	Toby told Josh "bite me" would be okay in New Jersey.

questions.text: Besides CJ, which member of the senior staff was on the list of people going to hell?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam (to CJ): "Can I see that?"

Yes.

	President Bartlet gave Sam the news right before the last mock debate of the episode.

questions.text: Bartlet to _____: "Honey, if we're going to have this fight, can we not do it in front of the Joint Chiefs?"
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	The President and Leo were arguing about Qumar.

questions.text: Who admitted to Sam that they were wrong?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Sam: "More often that not it's going to be the other way around."

questions.text: Which press member sat in the eighteenth seat, according to CJ?
questions.explanation:
Trent.

	CJ "Mark, Katie, Jessie, Phil, Steve, Betsy, Julie, Julie, Julia, Kevin, Paul, Tom, Sondra, Suzanne... Mike, Danny... Elizabeth... Eighteenth seat... eighteen, you can vote, vote sounds like 'moat,' which is a trench... Trent!"

questions.text: Toby told Josh, CJ, Sam and Charlie that he and Andy were pregant.
What was the operation called to reunite Toby and Andy?
questions.explanation:
Team Toby.

	Charlie "Because this is about love."

questions.text: Who did Josh tell, "You'll never lose me"?
questions.explanation:
Amy.

	Josh made the reply to Amy over her cell phone when she said she was afraid to lose him if she went into her apartment.

questions.text: Who said, "Do you mind if I talk while we walk?"
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Josh: "We might as well get used to having meetings in the corridors from now on. It may be our only hope. I now know why they made the Oval Office a special shape."
